summary: A crew digs up all of the old Atari 2600 game cartridges of "E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial" that were tossed into a landfill in the 1980s.
cast: Zak Penn|Joe Lewandowski|Robert Rentschler|Paul Sanchez|Manny Gerard|Nolan Bushnell|Seamus Blackley|Howard Scott Warshaw|Son Huffmon|Pat Magill|Mike Mika|Susie Galea|Andrew Reinhard|Raiford Guins|Ernest Cline|George R.R. Martin|Gary Whitta|Deb Lewandowski|Riley Rayburn|Austin Adamson|Chris Bores|Harrison Ford|James Rolfe|Steven Spielberg
title: Atari
